parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS pump can cause the loss of anti-lock braking system (ABS) functionality, increasing the risk of accidents, especially on two-wheeled vehicles.
symptoms: The brake light illuminates on the instrument panel
the ABS system fails to function.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the final drive can cause the rear wheel to wobble, hesitate, or lose power, leading to loss of control, accidents, or strandings.
symptoms: Clunking or grinding sounds from the rear when running over expansion joints or rough pavement
excessive play in the rear wheel
wobbling or hesitation of the rear wheel
especially when riding over road seams or rough pavement.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The fuel pump flange leak can cause fuel to leak onto the engine, creating a fire hazard and potentially leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: Fuel leaking from the fuel pump flange

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The faulty fuel gauge can cause the motorcycle to lose power, leading to accidents or potentially dangerous situations.
symptoms: sudden loss of power while riding.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the fuel sensor can cause the fuel gauge to malfunction, leading to unexpected fuel loss and potential accidents.
symptoms: sudden loss of power while riding
